verses.verse: Now those who <S%H2856>sealed<s%> <S%H5166>were:<s%> Nehemiah the <S%H8660>governor,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2446>Hacaliah,<s%> and <S%H6667>Zedekiah,<s%>
The <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> <S%H3442>namely,<s%> Jeshua the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H245>Azaniah,<s%> <S%H1131>Binnui<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2582>Henadad,<s%> <S%H6934>Kadmiel;<s%>

The <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> the <S%H7778>porters,<s%> the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> the <S%H5411>Nethinim,<s%> and all those who had <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%> to the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> their <S%H802>wives,<s%> their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> everyone who had <S%H3045>knowledge,<s%> and <S%H995>understanding<s%>â€”

they <S%H2388>joined<s%> with their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> their <S%H117>nobles,<s%> and <S%H935>entered<s%> into a <S%H423>curse,<s%> and into an <S%H7621>oath,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H8451>law,<s%> which was <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H8104>observe<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and his <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and his <S%H2706>statutes;<s%>
and that we would not <S%H5414>give<s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> nor <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for our <S%H1121>sons;<s%>

and if the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H4728>wares<s%> or any <S%H7668>grain<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H4376>sell,<s%> that we would not <S%H3947>buy<s%> of them on the <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> or on a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> and that we would <S%H5203>forego<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and the <S%H4853>exaction<s%> of every <S%H3027>debt.<s%>

Also we <S%H5975>made<s%> <S%H4687>ordinances<s%> for <S%H5414>ourselves,<s%> to charge ourselves <S%H8141>yearly<s%> with the third <S%H7992>part<s%> of a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God;<s%>

for the show <S%H4635>bread,<s%> and for the <S%H8548>continual<s%> meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and for the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> for the <S%H7676>Sabbaths,<s%> for the new <S%H2320>moons,<s%> for the set <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> and for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2403>things,<s%> and for the sin offerings to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for all the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

We <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people,<s%> for the <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H7133>offering,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> it into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> according to our <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> at <S%H6256>times<s%> <S%H2163>appointed,<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year,<s%> to <S%H1197>burn<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law;<s%>

and to <S%H935>bring<s%> the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of our <S%H127>ground,<s%> and the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of all <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of all kinds of <S%H6086>trees,<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>

also the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of our <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and of our <S%H929>livestock,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law,<s%> and the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> of our <S%H1241>herds<s%> and of our <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God;<s%>

and that we should <S%H935>bring<s%> the first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of our <S%H6182>dough,<s%> and our wave <S%H8641>offerings,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of all kinds of <S%H6086>trees,<s%> the new <S%H8492>wine<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> to the <S%H3957>rooms<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God;<s%> and the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> of our <S%H127>ground<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites;<s%> for <S%H3881>they,<s%> the Levites, take the <S%H6237>tithes<s%> in all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of our <S%H5656>tillage.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be with the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> when the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> take <S%H6237>tithes:<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> to the <S%H3957>rooms,<s%> into the <S%H214>treasure<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> of the new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and of the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> to the <S%H3957>rooms,<s%> where are the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H8334>minister,<s%> and the <S%H7778>porters,<s%> and the <S%H7891>singers.<s%> We will not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>
